body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, my name is Larry Moore and I'm a customer service agent at Best Motors, how may I assist you today? May I have your name please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello Larry, my name is Rebecca Perry.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Rebecca. Can you please provide me with your email address and phone number for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my email address is rebeccaperry@example.com and my phone number is three one zero four five six seven eight nine zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Rebecca. I have noted your email as rebeccaperry@example.com and your phone number as three one zero four five six seven eight nine zero. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I'm having some issues with the pricing at your dealership. The numbers don't seem to add up and I'm feeling frustrated.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Rebecca. Let's work together to resolve this matter. Could you provide me with more details about the pricing discrepancies you've encountered?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Certainly. The total amount quoted for the car I'm interested in seems higher than what was initially discussed. I'm not sure why there's a difference.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand your concern, Rebecca. Let me investigate this further for you to ensure everything is accurate. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Rebecca. We appreciate your patience. Have a great day!
